metadata.title: CVE-2020-22033 on Ubuntu 21.04 (hirsute) - medium.
metadata.description: A heap-based Buffer Overflow Vulnerability exists FFmpeg 4.2 at libavfilter/vf_vmafmotion.c in convolution_y_8bit, which could let a remote malicious user cause a Denial of Service.

criterions.comment: ffmpeg package in hirsute is affected and needs fixing.
